department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
short_summary: Contract award notice of hydroxocobalamin 5g for the treatment of known or suspceted cyanide poisoning.
description: The Public Health Agency of Canada intends to enter into an Agreement with Methapharm Inc. on behalf of the Public Health Agency of Canada and the Department of National Defence for the supply of 5g hydroxocobalamin injection for the treatment of known or suspected cyanide poisoning.
full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement: Acam Probol Hydroxocobalamin 5g

### Notice of Contract Award

#### Solicitation Number: WS4566325127

The Department of Public Works and Government Services is pleased to announce the intention to establish a contract with Methapharm Inc. for the supply of hydroxocobalamin injection, 5g, for the treatment of known or suspected cyanide poisoning on behalf of the Public Health Agency of Canada and the Department of National Defence.

### Tender Details

*   **Title:** Pac 5g d'hydroxocobalamine
*   **Notice Type:** Advance Contract Award Notice
*   **Procurement Category:** Government of Canada (GD)
*   **Selection Criteria:** Lowest Price
*   **Trade Agreements:** The tender is open to contractors who are qualified under the following trade agreements:
    *   *Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)*
    *   *Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement*
    *   *Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement*
    *   *Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)*
    *   *World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)*
    *   *Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)*
    *   *Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)*
    *   *Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)*
    *   *Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)*
    *   *Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)*
    *   *Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)*
    *   *Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement*
*   **Regions of Delivery:** Canada
*   **Contracting Entity:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
*   **End User Entity:** Public Health Agency of Canada (PHAC)
*   **Contact Information:**
    *   **Name:** Suzanne Bissonnette
    *   **Email:** [suzanne.bissonnette@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:suzanne.bissonnette@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
    *   **Notice URL:** [https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19580154?extsite=MTk1ODAxNTRfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](
